document_data.name: ''Ring of Flying''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of flying''''' was a type of [[ring|magical ring]] that allowed the wearer to fly.
document_data.Description: These rings were often made of [[platinum]] and edged with [[brass]]. They were covered with tiny runes imbuing the ring with magic.
document_data.Powers: The ring was activated with concentration and the result was identical to the ''[[fly]]'' spell. It allowed the wearer and up to {{SI|600|lb|k|long=yes}} additional weight to fly. The wearer could use the ring up to two hours a day. The ring also allowed the wearer to cast one ''[[feather fall]]'' spell per day.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Maligor]], the Zulkir of Alteration circa [[1362 DR]].
* [[Jutta]], Maligor's apprentice. She was given her master's ring to scatter the remains of [[Willeth Lionson]].
* [[Pharaun Mizzrym]], a talented [[drow]] wizard and Master of Sorcere circa [[1373 DR]].
* [[Belshazu]], a [[glabrezu]] whom Pharaun Mizzrym took the ring from.
